channel.title: Changing things on my server:
channel.description:
1: i have my shops good but how do i find them and delete them or move? i set price ad added items in shops.cfg but where can i find the x and y for the shop so i can edit it? or how do i delete it completely?
Also. i'd like to make my own pvp area in a set location. can someone help with that?
rep++ for any help thanks

item.title: Changing things on my server:
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

[quote=“SacredHeart, post:4, topic:405692”][quote author=Brandontan link=topic=502682.msg3677535#msg3677535 date=1311338914]
i can code myself. i’m just unfamiliar with THIS code (where files are located and where i CAN change stuff)
and how do you even know bro? i’m running a PI
[/quote]
Use delta if your confused.[/quote]
Delta is shitty its TOO easy and there is not alot you can do. i dislike it and i’m getting most familiar with this one but i’m having problems finding stuff not changing the code. i know PI is shitty too but i’m making shitty code badass. i like doing that

Read full topic
